listitem.para: Show a help dialog. You can also use -h with subcommands to get help about a specific subcommand. Example: &progcmd; set -h
Be more verbose. The verbosity level can be increased by adding more "v" behind the option. (Example: -vv and so on. Maximum: -vvv)
Displays a list with all supported language codes.
This option defines how many processes do you want to start for parsing all provided XML files. The default is: 4
The default should be fast enough, though.
